name: myth_or_truth
description: Myth or truth interactive quiz | USE: myth or truth, true or false, fact or fiction, myth quiz | NOT: either-or poll, product promotion, job posting

samples.heading:
Myth or Truth?
Let's Fact Check!
samples.myth_desc:
Going green is too expensive
and inaccessible.
samples.truth_desc:
Many sustainable practices, like
reducing energy use or eating
less meat, can save money in
the long run.
